relevant_findings.general: NAD (No Acute Distress), A&Ox3 (Alert and Oriented times 3)
relevant_findings.pulmonary: CTAB (Clear to Auscultation Bilaterally), crepitus essentially resolved
relevant_findings.abdominal: soft, nontender, minimal distension, no rebound or guarding, incisions c/d/I w/ dermabond
relevant_findings.extremities: no CCE (Cyanosis, Clubbing, Edema), left arm with small area of stable ecchymosis
